backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive OKLCH theme variables and dark mode definitions.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps and renders the Slideshow component inside a full‑height container.
Heart‑collecting mini‑game with tap interactions, animated hearts, progress tracking, and tap/completion SFX.
frontend/src/components/MusicControls.ts: Audio settings UI providing music toggle, SFX toggle, and a volume slider using local audio settings.
frontend/src/components/ShayariSlide.tsx: Renders a background image and animated 4‑line shayari text in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/SlideIndicator.t: Shows slide progress using animated dots and a numeric counter.
frontend/src/components/Slideshow.tsx: Manages slide navigation, background music, SFX hooks, and renders shayari slides or the ending game.
frontend/src/components/TeddyGameSlide.t: Empty placeholder file for a teddy game component.
frontend/src/data/shayari.ts: Exports type and array of 4‑line shayari poems used as slideshow content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalAudioSettings: Manages audio settings with React state synced to localStorage for music, volume, and sound effects toggles.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty query set since all data is stored client-side.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeNavigation.ts: Adds touch event listeners to detect left or right swipe gestures and trigger callbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for a romantic theme with color palettes and animations.
frontend/src/lib/randomNoRepeat.ts: Provides a function generator that returns random items from a list without repeating the previous one.
frontend/src/lib/sfxEngine.ts: Implements a small Web Audio API engine for UI sound effects including navigation, taps, and completion tones.
frontend/src/lib/speak.ts: Wrapper around Web Speech API to speak text with optional voice settings and stop ongoing speech.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom romantic theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's current state, features, architectural notes, and requirements for a romantic multi‑slide website with music and an interactive mini‑game. It lists implemented features, metadata, and planning details for future work.
